column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////They have a little coffee bar area which is very cute and you can watch the baristas make their morning concoctions in their little hipster way. AND THIS PLACE HAS A ZUMEX ORANGE JUICER! If you don't know what this is
column2: it's basically the coolest and best juicer known to man. Very European (I've only ever seen it in euro) and very expensive
column3: but it dispenses juice quickly and freshly and you get a glass of happiness! I love it and wish I could get one. /endsoliloquy/
